name: EncKeyRegistry
description: Encryption key registry. Stores user's public encription key generated by Metamask, the publicity of the key does not pose any security risk to the wallet/funds.

functionDecorators.name: deleteKey
functionDecorators.description: Deletes user's encryption key from the registry.

functionDecorators.name: getKey
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the key of a given address.

functionDecorators.name: setKey
functionDecorators.description: Saves user's encryption key to the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: key
parameterDecorators.description: encryption key to be stored as string.
